comment: This is for his Investments 4360 course. He is nice and understanding, but the class and his teaching is EXTREMELY difficult. 6 pop quizzes and 5 exams (drops 1 of each) closed notes, cheat sheet allowed for exam. No study guide given, so if you are not good at teaching yourself, I would stay FAR away from this course. Everything is in person.

This professor is truly one of a kind. His class feels like a warm hug of wisdom and knowledge, delivered by an industry expert. He's the best finance teacher to ever walk the earth. Always responsive, he welcomes any questions outside of class and genuinely cares about your success in the financial world. He gives his all to help students thrive.
Exceptional professor! His background as a Chief Investment Officer makes his lessons insightful and practical.  Truly a standout educator!

I recommend Professor Harmon. His experience as a Chief Investment Officer w/18 years in the industry makes his lectures insightful & practical. He is interactive, asks questions, and encourages class participation. He is intelligent but also approachable & accessible after class, always willing to provide clarification or guidance.
Professor Harmon is firm but fair. Very smart professor.
